Questions: What is eClass Hybrid Learning Management System?
Answers: eClass Hybrid Learning Management System is a comprehensive platform that seamlessly integrates traditional classroom teaching with online learning.

Questions: How can eClass benefit me as a teacher?
Answers: eClass empowers teachers by providing a centralized platform for course management, resource sharing, and communication. It simplifies administrative tasks and enhances collaboration with students.

Questions: How does eClass enhance communication with students?
Answers: eClass offers communication tools such as announcements, discussion forums, and messaging to foster better teacher-student interaction.

Questions: How can I get support if I encounter issues with eClass?
Answers: Our eClass system provides a dedicated support system from digitalEdu, including documentation, tutorials, and a helpdesk.

Questions: Can I track attendance using your system?
Answers: Yes you can  track attendance using our system. The system is integrated with an online attendance tracking system.

Questions: How secure is the information stored on the eClass Hybrid Learning management system?
Answers: Our eClass Hybrid Learning Management System prioritizes the security and privacy of user data. The platform employs encryption and authentication measures to protect information.

Questions: Are live virtual classes available on eClass Hybrid Learning Management System?
Answers: Yes, eClass Hybrid Learning Management System supports live virtual classes, allowing instructors to conduct real-time lectures, discussions, and interactive sessions. Students can join these sessions from the comfort of their own devices.

Questions: Does the system provide mobile compatibility?
Answers: Yes, Our eClass Hybrid Learning system provides mobile compatibility for better user experience.
